item.title: Job Opportunities

When: August 4-9, 2019;
Where: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Hong Kong;
Chairs: Dave Gilbert and Yijun Ruan,
Vice chairs: Victor Corces and Danny Leung.
